name: Old World Blues: Update Simulator
description:
(If the game seems frozen, try double clicking. It may take a while for scenes to load from the map.)

'Experience the 2.0 Update of Tomorrow, Today!'

- Minutes of Content!

- 10s of Characters to meet!

- 30 Second snippets of original music!

- And a little bit more!

Hope you get a laugh out of this, I know I did.

-Skip/SerialSymphony

Special Thanks to:

Syzygy, Striam: Testing

Faeelin: For being a bud

CJ: Pre-Alpha testing
